s1.title: Information you can trust
s1.text: Together, Lets Counter Sexual Harassment At Workplace
s1.text1: File a complaint with MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra

s2.title: Find Help Instantly
s2.text1: use MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra to report sexual harassement with ease

s3.title: Protect your privacy
s3.text1: Reimagining technology to empower women and girls

description: With MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra application, you can now find and reach your district Local Committee using this App. If you are experiencing or have experienced such harassment in your workplace, you can file a complaint here.

termsOfUse.heading: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.top_para: The terms and conditions of this agreement govern your use of the mobile software, website and other services.
termsOfUse.b1: INDICATING YOUR ACCEPTANCE BY CLICKING ON THE APPROPRIATE BUTTON OR BY DOWNLOADING, INSTALLING AND ACTIVATING THE APPLICATION, YOU AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS OF USE.
termsOfUse.p1: To subscribe to the services, you can download the application from various app stores and follow set up instructions inside the app, or go to MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra for more information.
termsOfUse.p2v1: For the purpose of these terms, the term ‘you’ or ‘your’ will be used for the person or entity using the services of this application. Accordingly, any person or entity agreeing to use the services of this application represents and warrants for themselves and on behalf of any third party that they are duly authorised on their behalf or on the behalf of a third party to enter and comply with these Terms & Conditions.
termsOfUse.p2v2: The developers reserve the right to change these Terms Of Use at any point of time including but not limited to changing the charges associated with use of services. The users will be informed through notifications of such changes or by posting the revised Terms of Use on the MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra website.
termsOfUse.p3: Partners and third party organisations whose content is quoted are not responsible for the content or services of any kind offered by MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra. Complaints filed are handled by Local Committees and the organisation partners who have created this App bear no responsibility towards the outcome or handling of complaints received through this service. Views and actions of individuals, district authorities and the Local Committee members expressed on or via this platform are not endorsed by the organisation partners.
termsOfUse.p4v1: As a condition of your use of services, you warrant that you will not use the services for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these terms of use. You may not use the services which in any manner disable, damage, impair or interfere with any other party’s use. You may not obtain information or materials through means not intentionally made available or provided through the services of this application.
termsOfUse.p4v2: The Services may contain voice over IP based services, messaging services, positioning services through GPS or triangulation technology, chat support services, forums, communities, news, personal web pages or other communication services designed to communicate with the developers, or the public at large. You agree to use the communication services to post, send or receive messages and material that are proper and related to the services.
termsOfUse.p5v1: You agree to not defame, abuse, threaten, stalk or otherwise violate the legal rights of others.
termsOfUse.p5v2: Publish, post, upload or disseminate any inappropriate, obscene, defamatory or unlawful information or material.
termsOfUse.p5v3: Upload files that contain viruses, corrupted files or any other similar software or programs that may damage the operation of another’s device.
termsOfUse.p5v4: Advertise or offer to sell or buy any goods or services for any business purposes, unless such service is allowed by the application.
termsOfUse.p5v5: Use of the platform for any other purpose than to file your complaints or seek information about your personal safety is prohibited. The information or services may not be sold, rented or commercialised.
termsOfUse.p5v6: Violate any applicable laws or regulations of the country.
termsOfUse.p5v7: Remove, obscure, alter, circumvent any proprietary information, means of identification, digital rights management tools or information included in or related to the services.
termsOfUse.p5v8: The developers reserve the right to investigate and prosecute the violations of any of the above to the fullest extent of the law. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the services at any time with notice.
termsOfUse.p5v9: We take no responsibility for the proper functioning of any networks or servers or any communications services aligned to the servers or use of this solution. We will have no liability to you or any third party arising as a result of failure of the services of any networks or servers.
termsOfUse.p6v1: You acknowledge that MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra and its suppliers own all rights, titles and interests in and to the Services, including without limitation, the Site, App, and Content (
termsOfUse.p6v2: excluding complaint details and/or Local Committee reports
termsOfUse.p6v3: ), and all underlying software and technology, including without limitation all Intellectual Property Rights. The provision of the Site, App, and Services does not transfer to you or any third party any rights, title, or interest in or to such Intellectual Property Rights. MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra and its suppliers reserve all rights not granted in these Terms. If you provide MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra with any feedback or suggestions regarding the Site, App, or Services ("Feedback"), you hereby grant MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra an unlimited, worldwide, royalty-free, and irrevocable licence to use, distribute, creative derivative works of, or otherwise use such Feedback in any manner. "Intellectual Property Rights" means any and all rights existing from time to time under patent law, copyright law, trade secret law, trademark law, unfair competition law, and any and all other proprietary rights, and any and all applications, renewals, extensions and restorations thereof, now or hereafter in force and effect worldwide.
termsOfUse.p7v1: You acknowledge and agree that the information, software, products and services included in or available through the application or website may include inaccuracies or typographical errors and that shall have no liability on the developers. You acknowledge that the developers may make improvements or changes in the services or on the application at any time without notice or liability to you.
termsOfUse.p7v2: Information you receive via the services or mobile application may not be relied upon by you for personal, security, medical, legal or financial decisions and you should consult an appropriate professional or specific advice tailored to your situation.
termsOfUse.p7v3: You agree that MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra and organisational partners are not liable or responsible for any damages arising from your use of the services. No advice or information, oral or written, obtained from the use of the application will create any warranty not expressly mentioned in these terms of use.
termsOfUse.p7v4: MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra and its organisational partners do not take responsibility for timely responses by Local Committees or other support services on the platform.
termsOfUse.p8: Certain of the names, logos, and other materials displayed in the Services constitute trademarks, trade names, service marks or logos ("Marks") of us or other entities. You are not authorised to use any such Marks. Ownership of all such Marks and the goodwill associated therewith remains with us or those other entities.
termsOfUse.p9: You agree to indemnify and defend the developers and its partners from and against any and all claims, liabilities, damages, losses, costs, expenses of any kind.
termsOfUse.p10v1: The Terms constitute the entire and exclusive and final statement of the agreement between you and us with respect to the subject matter hereof, and govern your use of the Services, superseding any prior agreements or negotiations between you and us with respect to the subject matter hereof. The Terms and the relationship between you and MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra shall be governed by the laws of India, without giving effect to any choice of laws or principles that would require the application of the laws of a different country or state. Any legal action, suit or proceeding arising out of or relating to the Terms, or your use of, the Services must be instituted exclusively in the state courts located in India and in no other jurisdiction. You further consent to personal jurisdiction and venue in, and agree to service of process issued or authorised by, any such court. Our failure to exercise or enforce any right or provision of the Terms shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision. If any provision of the Terms is found by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, the parties nevertheless agree that the court should endeavour to give effect to the parties' intentions as reflected in the provision, and that the other provisions of the Terms remain in full force and effect. You agree that regardless of any statute or law to the contrary, any claim or cause of action arising out of or related to use of the Services or the Terms must be filed within one (1) year after such claim or cause of action arose or be forever barred. The section titles in the Terms are for convenience only and have no legal or contractual effect. This Agreement cannot be transferred or assigned by you without the product’s prior written consent.
termsOfUse.p10v2: The terms of this Agreement can only be modified upon MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra's written agreement.

privacyPolicy.p1: Martha Farrell Foundation built the MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra application as a free service, intended for use as is. By using our Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacyPolicy.p2: To improve your experience with our Service, we may ask you to provide certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your name, mobile number, and email address. This information will be used only to provide and enhance the Service, and we will not share it with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy. The app uses third-party services such as Google Play Services and Google Analytics for Firebase, which may collect information to identify you. Please refer to the privacy policies of these third-party services for more information.
privacyPolicy.p3: When you use our Service, we may collect Log Data through third-party products in case of any errors in the app. This Log Data may include information such as your device's IP address, device name, operating system version, app configuration, date and time of use, and other statistics.
privacyPolicy.p4: This Service does not use cookies explicitly. However, some third-party code and libraries may use cookies to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to accept or refuse cookies and be notified when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
privacyPolicy.p5: We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate, provide, or perform Service- related services, or to analyze how our Service is used. These third-party service providers may have access to your Personal Information only to perform their tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
privacyPolicy.p6: We value your trust and strive to use commercially acceptable means of protecting your Personal Information. However, no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure and reliable. Therefore, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacyPolicy.p7: This Service may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. We have no control over the content, privacy policies, or practices of these sites and assume no responsibility for them. We strongly advise you to review the privacy policies of these external sites.
privacyPolicy.p8: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes made will be posted on this page and will be effective immediately. Please review this Privacy Policy periodically.
privacyPolicy.p9: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@marthafarrellfoundation.org.

Confidentiality.p: The MyAmbar Suraksha Chakra Application is fully compliant with the Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013. Therefore, ensuring complete confidentiality is the highest priority and has been given the utmost importance by the App developers and creators. The data is completely protected and care has been taken to secure all information, such that the only persons to access any complaint details will be Local Committee members with whom the complaint has been filed, and the complainants. Inquiry reports and annual reports will be shared with theDistrict Authority.
